XenotypeDef.label: Nat'L
XenotypeDef.description: On the Colorado Plateau, nature reclaimed what mankind lost. Small, diverse groups survived in hidden canyons, ancient ruins, and red-rock sanctuaries. The Natâ€™L are stewards of the wilderness, descendants of hikers, rangers, and wanderers who refused to abandon the land. They hold a quiet reverence for the world that was and the world that yet survives.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Nomadic tribes from the old National Parks, guardians of the wild places that endured the end.
